name: 2_animal_kingdom
description: __14:58 fri oct7 wk40 2022__ Just failed in my first attempt to set up an MVC module system. Because, I was trying to completely seperate data logic from business logic (at least using the little understanding I about the subject).  I believe that it is the asynchronous nature of the mongoose methods [e.g. find()] that messed me up. Anyway, I live to fight another day. So, I want to start all over again on a clean slate, and see if I can come up with what will work. By the way, I doing this, in a bid to have a personal understanding (i.e. to internalize) of what it takes to set up an API, as opposed to just a memorization of the steps.
author: Emmanuel Eni <eejeba@gmail.com>
